hero.description: An AI-powered platform for Japanese SMEs. From translation and digital distribution to partner discovery, everything runs in a single workflow.
hero.note: One workflow for translation, publishing, and partner discovery—plus AI insights and recommendations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Make overseas expansion practical for SMEs
benefits: Publish across social and Google Maps in one place

highlights.title: All-in-one solution
highlights.description: Translation, marketing, and partner discovery in one platform

footer.description: An AI platform built to help Japanese SMEs expand globally with confidence.

chat.title: Export & Import Expert Chat
chat.subtitle: Ask us anything about Japanese export/import operations
chat.example: Example: "What are the procedures for exporting food to the US?"
chat.errorDescription: Failed to send your message. Please try again later.

businessChat.pageSubtitle: Secure, deal-focused messaging to move partnerships forward.
businessChat.newChatToastDescription: Find a partner in Partner Search to begin messaging.
businessChat.noConversations: No conversations yet. Start a new one to get going.
businessChat.recommendationCopy: Send a concise offer with timeline and SLA.
businessChat.emptyPrompt: Start with your goal, scope, and timeline.
businessChat.partnerDetailsFallback: Select a conversation to view partner details.
businessChat.messagePlaceholder: Write a clear message with scope, timeline, and next steps...

partnerSearch.heroBadge: Verified partner data from trusted networks
partnerSearch.title: Partner Search
partnerSearch.subtitle: Find vetted partners worldwide and open new growth opportunities.
partnerSearch.searchPlaceholder: Search by company, industry, or capability...
partnerSearch.scrapePlaceholder:
Enter website URLs (one per line)
Example:
https://example.com
https://company2.com
partnerSearch.scrapeDescription: We'll extract company details and build profiles automatically.
partnerSearch.scrapeUseAiHint: Improves industry, specialties, and contact details when available.
partnerSearch.scrapeResultsEmpty: No companies were added from these URLs.
partnerSearch.scrapeConfirmNote: Review the results first. Choose to add them as-is or re-scrape and replace existing entries.
partnerSearch.advancedFiltersDescription: Select industry categories and regions to refine your search results.
tips: • Combine filters to narrow down your best matches
• No results? Use "Add Companies" to import from websites
partnerSearch.noResultsDefault: No companies matched your search criteria.
partnerSearch.noResultsTipScrape: Use "Add Companies" to import relevant companies from their websites.
partnerSearch.noResultsTipChangeQuery: Try broader terms or different regions to expand your results.
partnerSearch.emptyState: Start with a company name, industry, or capability to find partners.
partnerSearch.chatToastDescription: Open Messages to start a chat with {{company}}.
partnerSearch.chatAuthRequiredDescription: Please sign in to start a chat.
partnerSearch.chatUnavailableDescription: This company does not have a chat-enabled account yet.
partnerSearch.chatSelfDescription: You are viewing your own company profile.
partnerSearch.chatErrorDescription: We couldn't open a chat right now. Please try again.
partnerSearch.inquirySubtitle: The message below will be sent to the company's contact email. Please review and edit before sending.
partnerSearch.inquiryNote: Your contact information (name, email, company, etc.) will be included with this message.
partnerSearch.inquiryFooterNote: This message will be sent directly to the company's registered email address, and their reply will be delivered to your email address.

toasts.loginRequiredDescription: Please log in to send partnership inquiries
toasts.scrapeLoginRequiredDescription: Please log in to scrape company websites.
toasts.inquirySentDescription: Your partnership inquiry has been sent successfully
toasts.sendErrorDescription: An error occurred while sending your inquiry
toasts.scrapePreviewDescription: Previewed {{count}} company records. Confirm to add them.
toasts.scrapeErrorDescription: An error occurred while scraping website data.

partnerSearch.inquiryTemplate:
Dear {{company}} Team,

I hope this message finds you well.

I am reaching out to explore potential partnership opportunities between our organizations. After reviewing your company profile, I believe there may be synergies that could benefit both parties.

I would be particularly interested in discussing:
• Partnership structures and terms
• Mutual benefits of collaboration
• Future business development opportunities

I would welcome the opportunity to schedule a call or meeting to discuss this further.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters
